name: Oxalis (Alpha)
description:
A Sci-fi farming sim that takes place on a small planet named Oxalis. Explore the environment searching for alien plants and farm to survive.

Farming instructions (tutorial is still in-progress) -

1.)Fertilize the planters

2.)Plant seeds

3.)Water the plant

4.)Harvest (after it has grown)

Team:

Programming/Lighting/Co-Producer - Victoria Croteau

Modeler/3D Artist - Chris Greely

Modeler/3D Artist - Conner White

UI/2D Artist - Sabrina McKenzie

Concept Artist/Level Designer/Narrative Designer/Co-Producer - Jessica Swiercz

Level Designer - Kevin Hickson

Known bugs: 

Clipping through the dome with jetpack

Screen staying black on death

The current build is only built for PCs with decent graphics cards it will not run well on other computers yet. Optimization is still in progress
